text: Ryan John Campbell (born 7 February 1972) is an Australian former cricketer. He played as a wicket-keeper. He represented both Australia and Hong Kong internationally. He is the current head coach of Durham. He was the coach of the Dutch national team from 2017 to 2022. Campbell was born in Osborne Park, a suburb of Perth, Western Australia. He represented his home state from 1995–96 to 2005–06. In April 2022, while in the UK, Campbell went into cardiac arrest. He was in intensive care in a coma. He left Royal Stoke University Hospital three weeks later. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Australian cricketers Category:Hong Kong cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Perth, Western Australia
title: Ryan Campbell
